Description: Book of the Dead of Tentast; sheet 1(many fragments); row of black line vignettes at top; Hieratic text in red and black.
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (260)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57276) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57276)
